content.rendered:
Help Us Win Best of the Best!

Gottwals Books has been nominated for Best Book Store in both Macon and Warner Robins! Please vote for us every day until May 1 and help us win the Best of the Best contest.

Vote!

D.E.A.R. Month!

Drop Everything and Read (D.E.A.R.) Month is a time to try new titles or revisit old favorites. Stay tuned to our Facebook page for some fun promotions this month!

New Toys and Other Products!

Color With Us!

We are hosting a fun coloring event on April 22 from 1-3 p.m. Join us at our warehouse at 109 Pat Joiner Blvd. in Byron for a relaxed, quiet afternoon of coloring. We will provide coloring pages, color pencils, snacks, and coffee. Participants will get a FREE coloring book.

Space is limited so please RSVP via our Facebook event.

excerpt.rendered: Gottwals Books has been nominated for Best Book Store in both Macon and Warner Robins! Please vote for us every day until May 1 and help us win the Best of the Best contest.
